General.Name: Good Shroom Co Inc
General.Description: The Good Shroom Co Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells instant wellness beverages in Canada and the United States. It offers a range of functional mushroom beverages under the Teonan brand; cannabis-infused functional mushroom beverages under the Velada brand; and hash products under the Nordique Royale brand. The company also provides tea and coffee-based beverages. It offers its products through online stores and third-party platforms. The company is headquartered in Québec, Canada.
General.Address: 11 Beacon Street, Québec, QC, Canada, H9J 2E9
